SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ButtonInterface
 
Cell
Formats game board and cell color.
CellInterface
 
ChangeColor
Changes background color for all scenes according to user selection.
ColorThemeController
A controller for the color theme selection scene.
EndGame
Loads game over screen.
Game
Formats the elements of the game scene and handles the operations when a key is pressed.
GameInterface
 
GameModesController
A controller for the game modes selection scene.
GameMovement
Handles cells modification when a move is made on the game board.
GameMusic
Plays music when the application opens.
GameScene
Formats game elements.
GameStatus
Checks the status of the game.
HighScoreController
A controller for the high score list display scene that reads all users' scores from a file and shows the sorted high score list.
Main
Loads an application for a 2048 game.
MainMenuController
A controller for the main menu scene.
ModifyCell
Handles cell modifications.
MoveDirection
Handles cells movements based on direction for all cells on the game board.
PassDestination
Changes the position of cells based on direction on the game board.
RandomNum
Adds a random numbered cell between the numbers 2 and 4 in a random position on the game board.
Score
Saves user's highest score to file.
TextMaker
Formats the font, position, and color for the text for cell numbers.
Username
Compares and writes user's username and score into a file.
